name: The Stagones Legacy Edition
description:
⛰️ Welcome to the incredible world of Stagones! ⛪Inspired by ''The Sims'' series, The Stagones is a Life-Simulator on Scratch. You have the ability to control a Stagone and do all sorts of amazing things! Customize your house, create a family and make new friends!

As of this version, The Stagones currently includes 6 Patch Packs

Legacy Patch Packs are the packs that were created before the rework update.

NEW:
The Stagones Downtown
The Stagones Get Educated
The Stagones Fashion Life

LEGACY:
The Stagones Bon Voyage
The Stagones Party Time
The Stagones Superstars

OFFICIAL GAME GUIDE:

https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/527702/?page=1#post-5417814

CREDITS:

  • Neluex - Creator of The Stagones
  • @Giga-Konstantina - Alpha Tester
  • @TheStagonesCWB - Beta Tester

TEMPORARY USAGE OF SOUNDS FROM

  • The Sims Franchise - Electronic Arts
  • Scratch Sound Library

If there is something that you own and want it removed contact me!

Current build: v1.18.28
